mapper.select: SELECT p.*, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_likes pl WHERE pl.post_id = p.id AND pl.status = 1) AS likes_num, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_favorites pf WHERE pf.post_id = p.id AND pf.status = 1) AS favorite_num FROM posts p WHERE p.id = #{postsId}

SELECT p.id, p.title, p.content, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(p.image_list, '$[0].url')) AS image, p.tag_list, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(p.user_info, '$.avatar')) AS avatar, JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(p.interact_info, '$.likedCount')) AS liked_count FROM posts p WHERE
p.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%') AND
JSON_UNQUOTE(JSON_EXTRACT(p.user_info, '$.nickname')) like CONCAT('%', #{nickName}, '%') AND
p.content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{content}, '%') AND
JSON_CONTAINS(p.tag_list, JSON_QUOTE(#{tag})) AND
p.some_column = #{filter} AND
TRUE ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{sortBy.value} = 'likedCount' THEN JSON_EXTRACT(p.interact_info, '$.likedCount') END ${sortOrder.value}, CASE WHEN #{sortBy.value} = 'createTime' THEN p.create_time END ${sortOrder.value}, p.create_time DESC LIMIT #{pageNo}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (title, content, image_list, tag_list, user_info, interact_info, status, create_time, update_time, deleted, remark, json_map, pv) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{imageList, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{tagList, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{userInfo, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{interactInfo, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{deleted}, #{remark}, #{jsonMap, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, #{pv})
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_list = #{imageList, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, tag_list = #{tagList, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, user_info = #{userInfo, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, interact_info = #{interactInfo, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remark = #{remark}, json_map = #{jsonMap, typeHandler=com.baomidou.mybatisplus.extension.handlers.JacksonTypeHandler}, pv = #{pv} WHERE id = #{id}
